A companion to the [Photo Grid Demo](../photo-grid-demo/index.qmd), covering everything
else: wide photos, lightbox features, typography, tables, callouts, columns, and more.

## Wide Photo

The `.photo-wide` class shows a single image at full content width with a max height of
500px. Good for hero-style shots within a post.

::: {.photo-wide}
![Pont Alexandre III at dusk](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1520939817895-060bdaf4fe1b?w=1200&auto=format&q=80){group="wide" description="Pont Alexandre III at dusk." width="1200" height="800"}
:::

## Lightbox Groups

All images on this site open in a lightbox when clicked. The `group` attribute links
images into a shared gallery so you can arrow between them. Different `group` values
create separate galleries on the same page.

The `description` attribute adds a caption in the lightbox overlay — visible when you
click any image on this page.

### Inline Formatting

| Syntax | Result |
|--------|--------|
| `**bold**` | **bold** |
| `*italic*` | *italic* |
| `***bold italic***` | ***bold italic*** |
| `~~strikethrough~~` | ~~strikethrough~~ |
| `^superscript^` | ^superscript^ |
| `~subscript~` | ~subscript~ |
| `` `inline code` `` | `inline code` |
| `[link text](url)` | [link text](https://example.com) |

## Code Blocks

Inline: use `quarto render` to build the site.

Fenced block with syntax highlighting:

```yaml
# _quarto.yml excerpt
format:
  html:
    theme:
      - default
      - moving.scss
    css: styles.css
    lightbox: true
```

```css
/* Column modifier — 3 columns */
.photo-grid.cols-3 {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
}
```

## Math

Inline math: the focal length and aperture relationship is $N = f / D$ where $N$ is the
f-number, $f$ is focal length, and $D$ is the entrance pupil diameter.

Display math:

$$
\text{Exposure Value} = \log_2\!\left(\frac{N^2}{t}\right)
$$

where $N$ is the f-number and $t$ is exposure time in seconds.
